overview: Karan is a spoiled rich 25-year-old American NRI who has an extravagant life with his needs being at the center of his world. His grandfather passes away and leaves all his wealth in his will to a charity, an Ashram located at the banks of the Narmada river in India. The only way he could get his wealth back was to convince the Ashram to sign a No Objection Certificate.
title: Reva
